#id=1
#text=My hair was getting long and it was getting hard to style it .
#id=2
#text=It looked like it was time to get a haircut .
#id=3
#text=I called the hair salon to see if I could get an appointment with my favorite hairdresser .
#id=4
#text=She told me she could see me that afternoon at 3pm .
#id=5
#text=I drove to the salon , parked my car and went in .
#id=6
#text=I sat down on one of the chairs in the waiting area .
#id=7
#text=There were several other people waiting to see their hairdresser .
#id=8
#text=There was an assortment of magazines on a table in the center of the waiting area .
#id=9
#text=My hairdresser was still working on another client , so I picked up a magazine to read while I waited my turn .
#text=When she was ready for me I walked over to her station and sat down .
#text=The chair was operated by hydraulics , and she adjusted the height so she could reach my head easily .
#text=There was a large mirror in front of the chair , and a small shelf that held combs , brushes , and other tools .
#text=She placed a white tissue around my neck and then a black plastic cape which covered my shoulders , back and front .
#text=She then squirted a liquid from a spray bottle over my hair to wet it and combed it through .
#text=Although she has been cutting my hair for quite a while , she asked how I would like my hair cut since I might have decided to change the style .
#text=When I told her what I wanted she began to hold up sections of my hair in her fingers , using a small scissors to cut each piece .
#text=When my entire head of hair was cut , she took a blow dryer and brush and dried and styled my hair .
#text=When she was finished she gave me a small hand mirror and turned my chair around so I could see the back of my hair in the reflection of the large mirror .
#text=I was happy with the way it came out and told her so .
#text=She then removed the cape and tissue and we went to the front of the salon where I paid her for the cost of the haircut .
#text=She put the money in a cash register and I gave her some extra money as a tip , since I was so pleased with how my hair looked .
